ai-tha-ap32:1.3_0: With that the boy, I swept away.
ai-tha-ap32:2.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap32:2.3_0: I’ve given this gift to one,
ai-tha-ap32:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap32:3.4_0: It’s the fruit of giving that gift.
ai-tha-ap32:4.2_0: like myself stubborn on the inside.
ai-tha-ap32:4.4_0: I am the one named Isisiṅga
ai-tha-ap32:5.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap32:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhaddiya.
ai-tha-ap32:7.1_0: having (whole) danced the ten Elder Nuns,
ai-tha-ap32:9.3_0: One should not wear a low-caste,
ai-tha-ap32:10.2_0: within the third (foot), for the third reason,
ai-tha-ap32:10.3_0: if he has spoken of five hundred coins;
ai-tha-ap32:10.4_0: with the verses destroyed in all the Vedas:
ai-tha-ap32:11.1_0: The third sub-chapter on plants is finished.
ai-tha-ap32:12.1_0: The fourth section for recitation is finished.
